sections.title: Why Us?
sections.content: At Mastery Clinics, we are committed to providing the best medical services with high quality and exceptional attention to detail. Our team of experienced doctors and experts ensures a distinguished experience tailored to your health needs.

sections.title: What Sets Us Apart?
sections.content: We offer free consultations with the best doctors across various specialties. We focus on providing a comfortable and safe environment for patients, emphasizing transparency and credibility in our services.

sections.title: Services We Offer
sections.content: Our services include free medical consultations in fields such as dentistry, dermatology, nutrition, and more. We are here to support you on your journey to better health.

sections.title: How to Book?
sections.content: You can easily book through our website or by contacting us via phone. Choose a suitable appointment time, and we’ll take care of the rest.

sections.title: Customer Experience
sections.content: Many of our clients have shared their positive experiences with us, praising the exceptional service and personalized care they received.

sections.title: Frequently Asked Questions
sections.content: Is the consultation really free? Yes, the initial consultation is completely free. Can I choose my doctor? Absolutely, you can select the doctor that suits you.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: We are here to help! Reach out to us via phone or email for any inquiries.

startSection.startSectionDescription: We carefully protect your information and handle it with complete confidentiality to ensure your comfort and trust.

content.title: Privacy Policy – Mastery Clinic
content.Description: Welcome to Mastery Clinic! We place great importance on protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect and use your data when using our website

firstSection.firstSectionDescription1: When leaving a comment, we collect the data entered, the IP address, and browser information to help detect spam.
firstSection.firstSectionDescription2: Your email address may be sent to the Gravatar service for verification, and after your comment is approved, your profile picture becomes publicly visible.
firstSection.firstSectionDescription3: If you upload images to the site, it is recommended to remove location data (EXIF GPS), as visitors can extract this data from the images.

secondtSection.secondtSectionDescription1: When leaving a comment, you can choose to save your data in cookies for one year to make future comments easier.
secondtSection.secondtSectionDescription2: When you log in, cookies are stored to save your login information and display preferences.
secondtSection.secondtSectionDescription3: When you edit or publish an article, a cookie indicating the edited article is saved and deleted after a day.

thirdSection.thirdSectionDescription1: Articles on this site may include embedded content (like videos and images). This content behaves as if you visited the original site and may collect data about you or use third-party tracking tools.

fourSection.fourSectionDescription1: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the email sent to you.

fivedSection.fivedSectionDescription1: Comments and their associated data are retained indefinitely to facilitate the approval of future comments.
fivedSection.fivedSectionDescription2: For registered users, their personal information is stored and can be edited or deleted, except for the username.

sixSection.sixSectionDescription1: You can request a file containing all your personal data stored with us.
sixSection.sixSectionDescription2: You can request the deletion of your personal data, except for data we are required to keep for legal or administrative purposes.

sevenSection.sevenSectionDescription1: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

eightSection.eightSectionDescription1: If you have any questions regarding this privacy policy, please contact us via the email address provided on our website.

startSection.startSectionTitle: We take care of your beauty, because you deserve the best!
startSection.startSectionDescription: We offer you the latest skin care and treatment technologies with expert hands and utmost care.

doctors.title: Department doctors
doctors.description: Experts in dental treatment and cosmetics to ensure a healthy smile

one.name: Dr. Asmaa Awadallah
one.speciality: Deputy Director of Dermatology, Cosmetology, and Laser Master's Degree in Dermatology and Cosmetology Over 15 years of experience in cosmetic injections for treating skin and hair problems Member of the American Society of Laser and Cosmetology

two.name: Dr. Abeer Al-Asadi
two.speciality: Bachelor of Oral and Dental Surgery, Master of Periodontal Surgery and Dental Implants, Damascus University, 11 years of experience in the field of specialization, holds training certificates in advanced surgical techniques from Germany, South Korea, and India. Member of the Women's International Implantology Network (WIN).

machine.title: Advanced Devices for Your Beauty and Health
machine.description: Our expertise is supported by cutting-edge technology that cares for every detail of your skin.

description.one: A device that gently cleanses and exfoliates the skin to remove blackheads and dead skin cells.
description.two: Hydrates the skin with rich serums for renewal and deep moisturization.
description.three: Deeply cleanses pores, removing dirt, makeup residue, and dead skin from the surface.
description.five: Renews skin cells with active O2 oxygen therapy.

description.one: An advanced technology for non-surgical body contouring.
description.two: Firms the skin and treats sagging and subcutaneous fat.
description.three: Safely reduces waist circumference and visceral fat.
description.four: Effectively treats cellulite and stretch marks.
description.six: An effective alternative to lymphatic drainage, even post-liposuction or surgical lifts.
description.seven: Stimulates lymphatic glands to eliminate toxins and enhance collagen production.

one.question: What is the best way to whiten teeth?
one.answer: The best method depends on your condition, but our clinic offers professional teeth whitening using laser or a dentist-supervised gel, which provides fast and safe results compared to home products.

two.question: Is getting braces painful?
two.answer: You may feel some pressure or discomfort during the first few days after getting braces or after adjustments, but it is generally not very painful, and your mouth will adapt quickly.

three.question: How often should I visit the dentist?
three.answer: It is recommended to visit the dentist every 6 months for a check-up and cleaning, even if you don’t have any visible problems. This helps in prevention and early detection of any issues.

aboutMastery.title: Mastery Clinics is a Specialized Medical Institution
aboutMastery.description: Our goal is to provide comprehensive services in dentistry, dermatology, and aesthetics by achieving the perfect balance between health and beauty. We utilize the latest treatment technologies and high-quality materials. At Mastery Clinics, we strive to be the first destination for those seeking exceptional medical care. We are committed to delivering an outstanding treatment experience built on trust, transparency, and a deep focus on each patient’s individual needs.

cardOne.title: Our Mission
cardOne.description: To offer every client a comprehensive treatment experience that cares for both their health and beauty, focusing on quality and comfort at every stage of the journey.

cardTwo.title: Our Vision
cardTwo.description: To place the client at the heart of everything we do by providing specialized medical services that exceed expectations and reflect our commitment to precision and innovation.

doctorsSection.title: Department doctors
doctorsSection.description: Experts in dental treatment and cosmetics to ensure a healthy smile

howDentalHelpYour.title: How Can Orthodontics Help You?
howDentalHelpYour.description: Achieve a well-aligned smile and proper jaw function with our orthodontic services.

typeDental.title: Types of Orthodontics
typeDental.description: We offer a variety of orthodontic options to suit your unique needs.
typeDental.oneDescription: Relies on metal brackets and wires to effectively align teeth, but they are visibly noticeable.
typeDental.TwoDescription: Invisible and comfortable option, less likely to cause cavities or gum inflammation, and typically faster than traditional braces in most cases.
typeDental.ThreeDescription: Similar to metal braces but uses tooth-colored brackets for a more aesthetic look.
typeDental.FourDescription: Placed on the inner side of the teeth to remain hidden, offering similar results to traditional braces but may require an adjustment period.
typeDental.FiveDescription: A specialized solution for correcting major jawbone issues, such as protrusion or recession, supported by braces for optimal results.
typeDental.SixDescription: Used to guide the growth of the jaw and baby teeth in children, aiming to prevent future alignment issues.

doctorsSection.title: Department doctors
doctorsSection.description: Experts in dental treatment and cosmetics to ensure a healthy smile

derviceDigitaldentalimplants.title: About Dental Implant Services at Mastery Clinics
derviceDigitaldentalimplants.description: Our dental implant services rely on the latest global technologies. Titanium implants are fixed into the jawbone to serve as a stable foundation for replacement teeth that are strong and natural-looking, giving you a harmonious and beautiful smile that lasts for many years.

Conditionsinstallingbraces.title: Conditions for Successful Dental Implantation
Conditionsinstallingbraces.description: Discover the essential conditions for a successful dental implant procedure.
Conditionsinstallingbraces.one: Adequate bone density to support the implant
Conditionsinstallingbraces.two: Healthy gums free from active infections
Conditionsinstallingbraces.three: Good overall health with no chronic diseases
Conditionsinstallingbraces.four: Quitting smoking, as it greatly affects bone healing and success rate
Conditionsinstallingbraces.five: Commitment to daily oral and dental hygiene to avoid infections
Conditionsinstallingbraces.six: Avoiding medications that interfere with bone healing, such as certain osteoporosis drugs
Conditionsinstallingbraces.seven: No autoimmune diseases or history of radiation therapy to the head or neck
Conditionsinstallingbraces.eight: Willingness for regular follow-up visits with the doctor to ensure ideal results

readyFiveSteps.title: How to Prepare for a Dental Implant?
readyFiveSteps.description: Discover the steps that help you prepare properly
readyFiveSteps.four: 3D imaging of the teeth and jaw

sergerySixsteps.title: Stages of the Dental Implant Procedure
sergerySixsteps.description: Discover the stages you'll go through during the dental implant journey
sergerySixsteps.four: Abutment placement between the implant and future crown

Conditionsinstallingbraces.title: Conditions for Getting Braces
Conditionsinstallingbraces.description: Discover the necessary conditions for starting orthodontic treatment.
Conditionsinstallingbraces.one: Teeth and gums must be free of decay or infections to ensure successful treatment.
Conditionsinstallingbraces.two: There should be a misalignment issue such as crowding or gaps between teeth.
Conditionsinstallingbraces.three: Any health conditions affecting the mouth, such as diabetes or immune deficiency, must be addressed beforehand.
Conditionsinstallingbraces.four: The patient must be committed to attending appointments and strictly following instructions.
Conditionsinstallingbraces.five: The ideal age for braces varies by case, but treatment is suitable for both children and adults.
Conditionsinstallingbraces.six: Patient readiness to endure the treatment and maintain proper care of the braces is essential for success.

bracesSteps.title: Steps of Getting Braces
bracesSteps.description: Discover the stages you'll go through on your orthodontic journey.
bracesSteps.seven: Removing the braces and placing retainers

StepsClearBraces.title: Steps of Getting Clear Aligners
StepsClearBraces.description: Discover the stages you'll go through on your clear aligner journey.
StepsClearBraces.two: 3D scanning or impressions of the teeth
StepsClearBraces.three: Creating a treatment plan using AI technology
StepsClearBraces.four: Starting to wear the aligner trays
StepsClearBraces.six: Regular follow-up visits at the clinic
